name: Pocket World (marisa0704)
description:
Pocket World

A relaxing minimalistic casual RTS game.

Explore the hidden lands, gather resources, unlock new structures and build your own 16 x 16 blocks world.

Controls:
  • WASD/ Arrow keys to move cursor / menu options
  • Space to select
  • Tab to restart the game
  • Left click to change settings
  • Enter to toggle fullscreen ( for Windows version)

You can save and load game in the downloadable Windows version, which is not included in Web version.

PS: 

There is no final goal in this game, but there is an Ending (???). Take your time and enjoy the progress.

PS/PS:

There are twelve different colors of dog. Try to obtain all of them.
